name: 萨布丽娜·索丁
name_full: 萨布丽娜·索丁 Sabrina Saudin

last_movies.title: 黑袍纠察队 第四季
黑袍纠察队 第三季

introduction: Born in Toronto, Canada, Sabrina Saudin discovered her passion for the arts at a young age. Her introduction to the entertainment industry came through her older siblings, both seasoned actors, who inspired and guided her journey. Sabrina's early dedication to her craft led her to start acting classes at the age of 5, where she made her start in commercials and short films. Before the age of 10, she landed a supporting role in the movie, "Terry", which is based off the Canadian hero, Terry Fox, played by, Shawn Ashmore. In addition to on-camera work, Sabrina also has a background in voice work, lending her voice to various projects such as, "Super Why!".After a hiatus to focus on school, Sabrina resumed her training and auditions, marking her return to the industry. In 2019, she landed a recurring role as, Young Ellie on all 3 seasons of Netflix's acclaimed series, "Locke & Key". This marked the beginning of a string of successes, including roles in "Hudson & Rex" (CityTV) and "Rabbit Hole" (Paramount+), where she had the privilege of working alongside, Kiefer Sutherland. You will also recognize her from Amazon Prime's highly praised shows, "The Boys" & "Gen V" as, Also Ashley.Solidifying her presence as a rising talent in the entertainment industry, Sabrina continues to expand her resume with two films on the horizon in 2024. Including her Lead role as PJ Ellis in Hallmark Movie & Mysteries, "True Justice: Family Ties".
